spoiler_log.Phase Drift: Area 4 - West - Transport to Area 5 Entrance
spoiler_log.Progressive Suit:
Area 3 - Exterior - Gamma Shaft
Area 7 - Launch Tunnels Shaft
spoiler_log.Progressive Jump: Area 3 - Interior (West) - Transport to Area 3 Interior East
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 2: Area 3 - Interior (East) - Transport to Area 3 Interior West

hints.text: The Phase Drift can be found in Area 4 - West.
The Progressive Jump can be found in Area 3 - Interior (West).
The Power Bomb can be found in Area 3 - Interior (East).
The Grapple Beam can be found in Area 1.
The Lightning Armor can be found in Area 6.
A Progressive Suit can be found in Area 3 - Exterior.
The Baby Metroid can be found in Area 5 - Exterior.
The Progressive Beam can be found in Area 8.
An Energy Tank can be found in Area 3 - Interior (East).
A Progressive Suit can be found in Area 7.
